Security at Neureal

At Neureal, protecting your data and privacy is our highest priority. We use strong security measures to keep your information safe and private.

üîí

Data Protection

All information you share with us is encrypted during transfer and storage. This means your data is always protected from unauthorized access.

üí≥

Payment Security

Payments are handled securely through Paddle, a trusted payment processor. Your payment details are never stored on our servers and all transactions use encryption to keep your financial information safe.

üõ°Ô∏è

Account Security

We encourage the use of strong, unique passwords and offer two-factor authentication (2FA) for added protection. 2FA requires an extra step to verify your identity when logging in, helping keep your account secure.

Our systems monitor for unusual activity and will alert you or take action if something suspicious occurs.

üîí

Privacy

We respect your privacy and only collect the data needed to provide our services. We do not share your personal information with others without your permission.

See our Privacy Policy
‚ö†Ô∏è

In Case of Security Issues

If a security problem ever occurs, we have clear procedures to respond quickly, fix the issue, and notify you promptly if your information is affected.

If you suspect unauthorized access to your account, please contact us immediately at neurealchat@gmail.com

Thank you for trusting Neureal

We continuously work to maintain the highest security standards and protect your information. Security is not a one-time effort but an ongoing commitment at Neureal.
